name: Galactic Pocket Billiards
description: Galactic Pocket Billiards is a relaxing physics based puzzle game where you try to knock celestial objects into black holes.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and above Processor: 1.4ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512mb video memory DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and above Processor: 2.4ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 2gb video memory DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 100 MB available space
